teamBuff.name: Outro Skill: Silversnow
teamBuff.desc: The incoming Resonator has their Basic Attack DMG Amplified by 38% for 14s or until they are switched out.

teamBuff.name: Sequence Node 6: Daybreak Radiance
teamBuff.desc: After an {Ice Prism} or a {Glacier} is detonated, all team members' ATK is increased by 10% for 20s, stacking up to 2 times.
